Text: Tack för uppload, men vad sägs om lite mer information istället för junk i infotexten?!

@Junker836: By using Google Translate, I understand that you (and me) think that the NFO-text right here are rubbish.
I have to agree with you.
The Pirate Bay was better some years ago, but I hope that they some day will fix the formatting in the description.
I will try to improve the text here, but I cannot guarantee that it will look good.
Write on the Suprbay-forum if you want the problem to be fixed, I will do that later, and I suggest that you would do the same! :)
By the way, you can read most of the primary things by reading at the left side in the text.
Happy sharing!
